BatchGetServiceLevelIndicatorReport.name: BatchGetServiceLevelIndicatorReport
BatchGetServiceLevelIndicatorReport.description: Grants permission to batch get service level indicator report

BatchGetServiceLevelObjectiveBudgetRepor.name: BatchGetServiceLevelObjectiveBudgetReport
BatchGetServiceLevelObjectiveBudgetRepor.description: Grants permission to batch retrieve a service level objective budget report

CreateServiceLevelObjective.name: CreateServiceLevelObjective
CreateServiceLevelObjective.description: Grants permission to create a service level objective

DeleteAlarms.name: DeleteAlarms
DeleteAlarms.description: Grants permission to delete a collection of alarms

DeleteAnomalyDetector.name: DeleteAnomalyDetector
DeleteAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to delete the specified anomaly detection model from your account

DeleteDashboards.name: DeleteDashboards
DeleteDashboards.description: Grants permission to delete all CloudWatch dashboards that you specify

DeleteInsightRules.name: DeleteInsightRules
DeleteInsightRules.description: Grants permission to delete a collection of insight rules

DeleteMetricStream.name: DeleteMetricStream
DeleteMetricStream.description: Grants permission to delete the CloudWatch metric stream that you specify

DeleteServiceLevelObjective.name: DeleteServiceLevelObjective
DeleteServiceLevelObjective.description: Grants permission to delete a service level objective

DescribeAlarmHistory.name: DescribeAlarmHistory
DescribeAlarmHistory.description: Grants permission to retrieve the history for the specified alarm

DescribeAlarms.name: DescribeAlarms
DescribeAlarms.description: Grants permission to describe all alarms, currently owned by the user's account

DescribeAlarmsForMetric.name: DescribeAlarmsForMetric
DescribeAlarmsForMetric.description: Grants permission to describe all alarms configured on the specified metric, currently owned by the user's account

DescribeAnomalyDetectors.name: DescribeAnomalyDetectors
DescribeAnomalyDetectors.description: Grants permission to list the anomaly detection models that you have created in your account

DescribeInsightRules.name: DescribeInsightRules
DescribeInsightRules.description: Grants permission to describe all insight rules, currently owned by the user's account

DisableAlarmActions.name: DisableAlarmActions
DisableAlarmActions.description: Grants permission to disable actions for a collection of alarms

DisableInsightRules.name: DisableInsightRules
DisableInsightRules.description: Grants permission to disable a collection of insight rules

EnableAlarmActions.name: EnableAlarmActions
EnableAlarmActions.description: Grants permission to enable actions for a collection of alarms

EnableInsightRules.name: EnableInsightRules
EnableInsightRules.description: Grants permission to enable a collection of insight rules

EnableTopologyDiscovery.name: EnableTopologyDiscovery
EnableTopologyDiscovery.description: Grants permission to enable a CloudWatch topology discovery

GenerateQuery.name: GenerateQuery
GenerateQuery.description: Grants permission to generate a Metrics Insights or Logs Insights query string from a natural language prompt

GetDashboard.name: GetDashboard
GetDashboard.description: Grants permission to display the details of the CloudWatch dashboard you specify

GetInsightRuleReport.name: GetInsightRuleReport
GetInsightRuleReport.description: Grants permission to return the top-N report of unique contributors over a time range for a given insight rule

GetMetricData.name: GetMetricData
GetMetricData.description: Grants permission to retrieve batch amounts of CloudWatch metric data and perform metric math on retrieved data

GetMetricStatistics.name: GetMetricStatistics
GetMetricStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistics for the specified metric

GetMetricStream.name: GetMetricStream
GetMetricStream.description: Grants permission to return the details of a CloudWatch metric stream

GetMetricWidgetImage.name: GetMetricWidgetImage
GetMetricWidgetImage.description: Grants permission to retrieve snapshots of metric widgets

GetService.name: GetService
GetService.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a service

GetServiceData.name: GetServiceData
GetServiceData.description: Grants permission to retrieve service data

GetServiceLevelObjective.name: GetServiceLevelObjective
GetServiceLevelObjective.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about service level objective

GetTopologyDiscoveryStatus.name: GetTopologyDiscoveryStatus
GetTopologyDiscoveryStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve a CloudWatch topology discovery status

GetTopologyMap.name: GetTopologyMap
GetTopologyMap.description: Grants permission to retrieve a CloudWatch topology map

Link.name: Link
Link.description: Grants permission to share CloudWatch resources with a monitoring account

ListDashboards.name: ListDashboards
ListDashboards.description: Grants permission to return a list of all CloudWatch dashboards in your account

ListManagedInsightRules.name: ListManagedInsightRules
ListManagedInsightRules.description: Grants permission to list available managed Insight Rules for a given Resource ARN

ListMetricStreams.name: ListMetricStreams
ListMetricStreams.description: Grants permission to return a list of all CloudWatch metric streams in your account

ListMetrics.name: ListMetrics
ListMetrics.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of valid metrics stored for the AWS account owner

ListServiceLevelObjectives.name: ListServiceLevelObjectives
ListServiceLevelObjectives.description: Grants permission to list service level objectives

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon CloudWatch resource

PutAnomalyDetector.name: PutAnomalyDetector
PutAnomalyDetector.description: Grants permission to create or update an anomaly detection model for a CloudWatch metric

PutCompositeAlarm.name: PutCompositeAlarm
PutCompositeAlarm.description: Grants permission to create or update a composite alarm

PutDashboard.name: PutDashboard
PutDashboard.description: Grants permission to create a CloudWatch dashboard, or update an existing dashboard if it already exists

PutInsightRule.name: PutInsightRule
PutInsightRule.description: Grants permission to create a new insight rule or replace an existing insight rule

PutManagedInsightRules.name: PutManagedInsightRules
PutManagedInsightRules.description: Grants permission to create managed Insight Rules

PutMetricAlarm.name: PutMetricAlarm
PutMetricAlarm.description: Grants permission to create or update an alarm and associates it with the specified Amazon CloudWatch metric

PutMetricData.name: PutMetricData
PutMetricData.description: Grants permission to publish metric data points to Amazon CloudWatch

PutMetricStream.name: PutMetricStream
PutMetricStream.description: Grants permission to create a CloudWatch metric stream, or update an existing metric stream if it already exists

SetAlarmState.name: SetAlarmState
SetAlarmState.description: Grants permission to temporarily set the state of an alarm for testing purposes

StartMetricStreams.name: StartMetricStreams
StartMetricStreams.description: Grants permission to start all CloudWatch metric streams that you specify

StopMetricStreams.name: StopMetricStreams
StopMetricStreams.description: Grants permission to stop all CloudWatch metric streams that you specify

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon CloudWatch resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon CloudWatch resource

UpdateServiceLevelObjective.name: UpdateServiceLevelObjective
UpdateServiceLevelObjective.description: Grants permission to update a service level objective
